^0.8.20;\r\n\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/extensions/ERC721URIStorage.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/extensions/ERC721Enumerable.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Strings.sol\";\r\n\r\n/**\r\n * @title WalletConnectNFT\r\n * @dev Complete NFT contract with minting, metadata, and WalletConnect optimization\r\n * @notice This contract is designed for easy integration with WalletConnect\r\n */\r\ncontract WalletConnectNFT is ERC721URIStorage, ERC721Enumerable, Ownable, ReentrancyGuard {\r\n    using Strings for uint256;\r\n\r\n    // ============ State Variables ============\r\n    \r\n    uint256 private _tokenIds;\r\n    \r\n    // Collection info\r\n    string public baseTokenURI;\r\n    string public collectionDescription = \"WalletConnect NFT Collection - Mint your unique digital asset!\";\r\n    \r\n    // Minting configuration\r\n    uint256 public mintPrice = 0.001 ether; // Affordable for testing\r\n    uint256 public maxSupply = 10000;\r\n    uint256 public maxMintPerWallet = 10;\r\n    bool public mintingEnabled = true;\r\n    bool public publicMintEnabled = true;\r\n    \r\n    // Whitelist for presale\r\n    mapping(address => bool) public whitelist;\r\n    mapping(address => uint256) public mintedPerWallet;\r\n    \r\n    // Royalties (EIP-2981)\r\n    address public royaltyReceiver;\r\n    uint96 public royaltyFeeNumerator = 500; // 5% = 500/10000\r\n\r\n    // ============ Events ============\r\n    \r\n    event NFTMinted(\r\n        address indexed minter,\r\n        uint256 indexed tokenId,\r\n        string tokenURI,\r\n        uint256 mintPrice\r\n    );\r\n    event MintPriceUpdated(uint256 oldPrice, uint256 newPrice);\r\n    event MintingToggled(bool enabled);\r\n    event PublicMintToggled(bool enabled);\r\n    event BaseURIUpdated(string newBaseURI);\r\n    event WhitelistUpdated(address indexed user, bool status);\r\n    event Withdrawn(address indexed owner, uint256 amount);\r\n\r\n    // ============ Constructor ============\r\n\r\n    constructor(\r\n        string memory _name,\r\n        string memory _symbol,\r\n        string memory _baseTokenURI\r\n    ) ERC721(_name, _symbol) Ownable(msg.sender) {\r\n        baseTokenURI = _baseTokenURI;\r\n        royaltyReceiver = msg.sender;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ Minting Functions ============\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Public mint function - main entry point for users\r\n     * @param _tokenURI IPFS URI for the NFT metadata\r\n     */\r\n    function mint(string memory _tokenURI) external payable nonReentrant returns (uint256) {\r\n        require(mintingEnabled, \"Minting is disabled\");\r\n        require(publicMintEnabled || whitelist[msg.sender], \"Public mint not enabled\");\r\n        require(_tokenIds < maxSupply, \"Max supply reached\");\r\n        require(msg.value >= mintPrice, \"Insufficient payment\");\r\n        require(\r\n            mintedPerWallet[msg.sender] < maxMintPerWallet,\r\n            \"Exceeded max mint per wallet\"\r\n        );\r\n        require(bytes(_tokenURI).length > 0, \"Token URI cannot be empty\");\r\n\r\n        return _mintNFT(msg.sender, _tokenURI);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Batch mint multiple NFTs in one transaction\r\n     * @param _tokenURIs Array of IPFS URIs\r\n     */\r\n    function mintBatch(string[] memory _tokenURIs) \r\n        external \r\n        payable \r\n        nonReentrant \r\n        returns (uint256[] memory) \r\n    {\r\n        require(mintingEnabled, \"Minting is disabled\");\r\n        require(publicMintEnabled || whitelist[msg.sender], \"Public mint not enabled\");\r\n        require(_tokenURIs.length > 0, \"Must mint at least 1\");\r\n        require(_tokenURIs.length <= 20, \"Maximum 20 per transaction\");\r\n        require(\r\n            _tokenIds + _tokenURIs.length <= maxSupply,\r\n            \"Would exceed max supply\"\r\n        );\r\n        require(\r\n            msg.value >= mintPrice * _tokenURIs.length,\r\n            \"Insufficient payment\"\r\n        );\r\n        require(\r\n            mintedPerWallet[msg.sender] + _tokenURIs.length <= maxMintPerWallet,\r\n            \"Would exceed max mint per wallet\"\r\n        );\r\n\r\n        uint256[] memory tokenIds = new uint256[](_tokenURIs.length);\r\n\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < _tokenURIs.length; i++) {\r\n            tokenIds[i] = _mintNFT(msg.sender, _tokenURIs[i]);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        return tokenIds;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Free mint for whitelisted addresses\r\n     * @param _tokenURI IPFS URI for the NFT metadata\r\n     */\r\n    function freeMint(string memory _tokenURI) external nonReentrant returns (uint256) {\r\n        require(mintingEnabled, \"Minting is disabled\");\r\n        require(whitelist[msg.sender], \"Not whitelisted\");\r\n        require(_tokenIds < maxSupply, \"Max supply reached\");\r\n        require(\r\n            mintedPerWallet[msg.sender] < maxMintPerWallet,\r\n            \"Exceeded max mint per wallet\"\r\n        );\r\n\r\n        return _mintNFT(msg.sender, _tokenURI);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Owner can mint to any address (for giveaways, etc.)\r\n     * @param _to Recipient address\r\n     * @param _tokenURI IPFS URI for the NFT metadata\r\n     */\r\n    function mintTo(address _to, string memory _tokenURI) \r\n        external \r\n        onlyOwner \r\n        returns (uint256) \r\n    {\r\n        require(_tokenIds < maxSupply, \"Max supply reached\");\r\n        return _mintNFT(_to, _tokenURI);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Internal minting logic\r\n     */\r\n    function _mintNFT(address _to, string memory _tokenURI) \r\n        private \r\n        returns (uint256) \r\n    {\r\n        _tokenIds++;\r\n        uint256 newTokenId = _tokenIds;\r\n\r\n        _safeMint(_to, newTokenId);\r\n        _setTokenURI(newTokenId, _tokenURI);\r\n\r\n        mintedPerWallet[_to]++;\r\n\r\n        emit NFTMinted(_to, newTokenId, _tokenURI, msg.value);\r\n\r\n        return newTokenId;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ View Functions ============\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Get total minted supply\r\n     */\r\n    function totalSupply() public view override(ERC721Enumerable) returns (uint256) {\r\n        return _tokenIds;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Get all token IDs owned by an address\r\n     */\r\n    function tokensOfOwner(address _owner) \r\n        external \r\n        view \r\n        returns (uint256[] memory) \r\n    {\r\n        uint256 tokenCount = balanceOf(_owner);\r\n        uint256[] memory tokenIds = new uint256[](tokenCount);\r\n\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < tokenCount; i++) {\r\n            tokenIds[i] = tokenOfOwnerByIndex(_owner, i);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        return tokenIds;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Get detailed token information\r\n     */\r\n    function getTokenInfo(uint256 _tokenId) \r\n        external \r\n        view \r\n        returns (\r\n            address owner,\r\n            string memory uri,\r\n            bool exists\r\n        ) \r\n    {\r\n        exists = _ownerOf(_tokenId) != address(0);\r\n        if (exists) {\r\n            owner = ownerOf(_tokenId);\r\n            uri = tokenURI(_tokenId);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Get minting statistics for an address\r\n     */\r\n    function getMintStats(address _user) \r\n        external \r\n        view \r\n        returns (\r\n            uint256 minted,\r\n            uint256 remaining,\r\n            bool isWhitelisted,\r\n            uint256 price\r\n        ) \r\n    {\r\n        minted = mintedPerWallet[_user];\r\n        remaining = maxMintPerWallet - minted;\r\n        isWhitelisted = whitelist[_user];\r\n        price = mintPrice;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Get collection statistics\r\n     */\r\n mintPrice_,\r\n            bool mintingEnabled_,\r\n            bool publicMintEnabled_\r\n        ) \r\n    {\r\n        return (\r\n            _tokenIds,\r\n            maxSupply,\r\n function tokenURI(uint256 _tokenId)\r\n        public\r\n        view\r\n        override(ERC721, ERC721URIStorage)\r\n        returns (string memory)\r\n    {\r\n        return super.tokenURI(_tokenId);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ Whitelist Functions ============\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Add address to whitelist\r\n     */\r\n    function addToWhitelist(address _user) external onlyOwner {\r\n        whitelist[_user] = true;\r\n        emit WhitelistUpdated(_user, true);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Add multiple addresses to whitelist\r\n     */\r\n    function addToWhitelistBatch(address[] calldata _users) external onlyOwner {\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < _users.length; i++) {\r\n            whitelist[_users[i]] = true;\r\n            emit WhitelistUpdated(_users[i], true);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Remove address from whitelist\r\n     */\r\n    function removeFromWhitelist(address _user) external onlyOwner {\r\n        whitelist[_user] = false;\r\n        emit WhitelistUpdated(_user, false);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ Admin Functions ============\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Update mint price\r\n     */\r\n    function setMintPrice(uint256 _newPrice) external onlyOwner {\r\n        uint256 oldPrice = mintPrice;\r\n        mintPrice = _newPrice;\r\n        emit MintPriceUpdated(oldPrice, _newPrice);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Update max supply\r\n     */\r\n    function setMaxSupply(uint256 _newMaxSupply) external onlyOwner {\r\n function setMaxMintPerWallet(uint256 _newMax) external onlyOwner {\r\n        maxMintPerWallet = _newMax;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Toggle minting on/off\r\n     */\r\n    function toggleMinting() external onlyOwner {\r\n        mintingEnabled = !mintingEnabled;\r\n        emit MintingToggled(mintingEnabled);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Toggle public minting on/off\r\n     */\r\n    function togglePublicMint() external onlyOwner {\r\n        publicMintEnabled = !publicMintEnabled;\r\n        emit PublicMintToggled(publicMintEnabled);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Update base URI\r\n     */\r\n    function setBaseURI(string memory _newBaseURI) external onlyOwner {\r\n        baseTokenURI = _newBaseURI;\r\n        emit BaseURIUpdated(_newBaseURI);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Update collection description\r\n     */\r\n    function setCollectionDescription(string memory _description) external onlyOwner {\r\n        collectionDescription = _description;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Update royalty info\r\n     */\r\n    function setRoyaltyInfo(address _receiver, uint96 _feeNumerator) external onlyOwner {\r\n        require(_feeNumerator <= 1000, \"Royalty fee too high\"); // Max 10%\r\n        royaltyReceiver = _receiver;\r\n        royaltyFeeNumerator = _feeNumerator;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ Withdraw Functions ============\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Withdraw contract balance to owner\r\n     */\r\n    function withdraw() external onlyOwner nonReentrant internal\r\n        override(ERC721, ERC721Enumerable)\r\n    {\r\n        super._increaseBalance(account, value);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function supportsInterface(bytes4 interfaceId)\r\n        public\r\n        view\r\n        override(ERC721URIStorage, ERC721Enumerable)\r\n        returns (bool)\r\n    {\r\n        return super.supportsInterface(interfaceId);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // {\r\n        mintingEnabled = true;\r\n        publicMintEnabled = true;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Receive ETH\r\n     */\r\n    receive() external payable devdoc.details: Complete NFT contract with minting, metadata, and WalletConnect optimization

ERC721IncorrectOwner(address,uint256,add.details: Indicates an error related to the ownership over a particular token. Used in transfers.

params.owner: Address of the current owner of a token.
params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC721InsufficientApproval(address,uint2.details: Indicates a failure with the `operator`s approval. Used in transfers.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

ERC721InvalidApprover(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.

ERC721InvalidOperator(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `operator` to be approved. Used in approvals.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

ERC721InvalidOwner(address).details: Indicates that an address can't be an owner. For example, `address(0)` is a forbidden owner in EIP-20. Used in balance queries.

params.owner: Address of the current owner of a token.

ERC721InvalidReceiver(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.

params.receiver: Address to which tokens are being transferred.

ERC721InvalidSender(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.

params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC721NonexistentToken(uint256).details: Indicates a `tokenId` whose `owner` is the zero address.

ERC721OutOfBoundsIndex(address,uint256).details: An `owner`'s token query was out of bounds for `index`. NOTE: The owner being `address(0)` indicates a global out of bounds index.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets.

BatchMetadataUpdate(uint256,uint256).details: This event emits when the metadata of a range of tokens is changed. So that the third-party platforms such as NFT market could timely update the images and related attributes of the NFTs.

MetadataUpdate(uint256).details: This event emits when the metadata of a token is changed. So that the third-party platforms such as NFT market could timely update the images and related attributes of the NFT.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`.

emergencyPause().details: Pause all minting in case of emergency

params._tokenURI: IPFS URI for the NFT metadata

getMintStats(address).details: Get minting statistics for an address

mint(string).details: Public mint function - main entry point for users

params._tokenURI: IPFS URI for the NFT metadata

mintBatch(string[]).details: Batch mint multiple NFTs in one transaction

mintTo(address,string).details: Owner can mint to any address (for giveaways, etc.)

params._tokenURI: IPFS URI for the NFT metadata

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

royaltyInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Returns royalty info for a token

tokenURI(uint256).details: Override tokenURI to support both base URI and custom URIs

tokensOfOwner(address).details: Get all token IDs owned by an address

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
